      • getExecutorCommand

        protected java.util.List<java.lang.String> getExecutorCommand​(java.lang.String containerId,
                                                              int numOfInstances,
                                                              boolean isExecutor)
        Generates the command to start Heron within the container.
        Parameters:
        containerId - Passed down to <>SchedulerUtils to generate executor command.
        numOfInstances - Used to configure the debugging ports.
        isExecutor - Flag used to generate the correct shard_id.
        Returns:
        The complete command to start Heron in a container.

      • setShardIdEnvironmentVariableCommand

        protected static java.lang.String setShardIdEnvironmentVariableCommand​(boolean isExecutor)
        Configures the shard_id for the Heron container based on whether it is an executor or manager. executor IDs are [1 - n) and the manager IDs start at 0.
        Parameters:
        isExecutor - Switch flag to generate correct command.
        Returns:
        The command required to put the Heron instance in executor or manager mode.

        Adds tolerations to the Pod Spec with Heron's values taking precedence.
        Parameters:
        spec - Pod Spec to be configured.

        Returns:

      • configureContainerResources

        protected void configureContainerResources​(io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1Container container,
                                           Config configuration,
                                           Resource resource,
                                           boolean isExecutor)
        Configures the resources in the container with values in the config taking precedence.
        Parameters:
        container - The container to be configured.
        configuration - The Config object to check if a resource request needs to be set.
        resource - User defined resources limits from input.
        isExecutor - Flag to indicate configuration for an executor or manager.

      • createResourcesRequirement

        protected java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​io.kubernetes.client.custom.Quantity> createResourcesRequirement​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> configs)
        Creates Resource Requirements from a Map of Config items for CPU and Memory.
        Parameters:
        configs - Configs to be parsed for configuration.
        Returns:
        Configured Resource Requirements. An empty map will be returned if there are no configs.

                                       io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1Container container)
        Configures the ports in the container with those Heron requires. Heron's values take precedence.
        Parameters:
        remoteDebugEnabled - Flag used to indicate if debugging ports need to be added.
        numberOfInstances - The number of debugging ports to be opened.
        container - container to be configured.

      • loadPodFromTemplate

        protected io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1PodTemplateSpec loadPodFromTemplate​(boolean isExecutor)
        Initiates the process of locating and loading Pod Template from a ConfigMap. The loaded text is then parsed into a usable Pod Template.
        Parameters:
        isExecutor - Flag to indicate loading of Pod Template for Executor or Manager.
        Returns:
        A Pod Template which is loaded and parsed from a ConfigMap.

      • getPodTemplateLocation

        protected Pair<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> getPodTemplateLocation​(boolean isExecutor)
        Extracts the ConfigMap and Pod Template names from the CLI parameter.
        Parameters:
        isExecutor - Flag to indicate loading of Pod Template for Executor or Manager.
        Returns:
        A pair of the form (ConfigMap, Pod Template).

        Returns:

      • configurePodWithVolumesAndMountsFromCLI

        protected void configurePodWithVolumesAndMountsFromCLI​(io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1PodSpec podSpec,
                                                       io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1Container executor,
                                                       java.util.List<io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1Volume> volumes,
                                                       java.util.List<io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1VolumeMount> volumeMounts)
        Configures the Pod Spec and Heron container with Volumes and Volume Mounts.
        Parameters:
        podSpec - All generated V1Volume will be placed in the Pod Spec.
        executor - All generated V1VolumeMount will be placed in the Container.
        volumes - Volumes to be inserted in the Pod Spec.
        volumeMounts - Volumes Mounts to be inserted in the Heron container.

      • getPersistentVolumeClaimLabels

        protected static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> getPersistentVolumeClaimLabels​(java.lang.String topologyName)
        Generates the Label which are attached to a Topology's Persistent Volume Claims.
        Parameters:
        topologyName - Attached to the topology match label.
        Returns:
        A map consisting of the label-value pairs to be used in Labels.
